title: Errata Properus
content:
A bit of a posting spree here...   
   
Another MT font, similar in style to Dorothy. Like the majority of my fonts, I designed it with decorative useage in mind. However, I find that it doesn't look that bad set as a text font. Sort of a stylized Sans or something.   
   
The numbers need a bit of work, I think, but on the whole, I enjoy the balance of this character set. Perhaps the lc x and uc x and y betray the rounded style of the other characters?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/22974.gif)
author: tyleryoung
